text:
@realDonaldTrump @VP Donald Trump is more dangerous than the Coronavirus virus!
He had a chance to step up
& get ahead of this pandemic
but he couldn’t do it. 
He lacks the character to rise up
and the fiber that makes one great during times of duress. 
He crumbles....
Like a little fucking man.🤦🏻‍♂️
